oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Response of Sonchus arvensis to mechanical and cultural weed control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanhala, P.
Lötjönen, T.
Salonen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In order to study the biology and physical control of Sonchus arvensis, a 3-year field experiment was established in 2001 at Vihti, southern Finland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vanhala, P.; Lötjönen, T. and Salonen, J. (2004) Response of Sonchus arvensis to mechanical and cultural weed control. Paper at: 6th EWRS workshop on physical and cultural weed control, Lillehammer, Norway, 8-10 March 2004.
